snippet: FELDER--Jerome, a/k/a Doc Pomus Twenty-five years is but a moment: the blink of an eye; the beat of a heart; the fall of a tear, For we think of you every day that passes by. Sharyn, Geoffrey, Raoul, Myrna, Shirlee, Will, Rachel, James and Lily 1/3
lead_paragraph: FELDER--Jerome, a/k/a Doc Pomus Twenty-five years is but a moment: the blink of an eye; the beat of a heart; the fall of a tear, For we think of you every day that passes by. Sharyn, Geoffrey, Raoul, Myrna, Shirlee, Will, Rachel, James and Lily 1/3
